title: Kellie's Diary #3
description: ***UPDATE 3/8/15 - Now includes a text version.A series of diary entries through the eyes of a young girl as she tries to survive the end of the world.Kellie has found stability with her new home and family, and is coming to terms with the events of her past. Yet stability, like everything else, doesn't last forever.Part 3 of the series.
author: Thomas  Jenner
